Searches
GET /merchants?action=normalSearch&xxx=yyy
GET /merchants/:ID?action=getRestaurantInfo&xxx=yyy
GET /merchants?action=mapSearch&xxx=yyy

PUT /merchants/:ID/review?userID=xxx&something=yyy
PUT /merchants/:ID/favorite?userID=xxx


add reservation
POST /reservations?action=userReservationSubmission&restaurantID=xxx&Datetime=xxx&timeslot=xxxx&numberOfParticipant=x

get user reservation list
GET /reservations?action=userReservationList&userID=xxx

sign up
POST /user?action=userSignup&xxxxxuyyyyy
login
GET /user/:LOGIN?action=userLogin&xxxxyyyy
logout

PUT /user/:ID/facebook?token=xxxx
